attributes.title: DONT DOWNLOAD HORRIBLE APP!
attributes.review: All my fellow trump supporters please I beg you to not download this app, at first I downloaded it to support our lovely president but I no longer will be showing my support, well no longer with this app. It took up all the storage on my phone and before I downloaded the app I had plenty of storage on my phone and thatâ€™s not even the worst part. As soon as I downloaded it it would not stop asking for my social security number and I kept declining but my phone would not stop glitching. I also had to enter my phone number and 10 minutes after I did that I would not and I still am getting so many scam calls that are actually making me fear for my safety. They all seem to be coming from China and the first phone call I got was from this man and now he wonâ€™t stop harassing me with phone calls saying that if I donâ€™t vote for trump heâ€™s going to hack everything on my phone. I also keep getting txt messages, (assuming theyâ€™re from the same man). One txt message I got sent was written in Chinese Iâ€™m pretty sure and I translated it and it said the same thing the man did in the phone call. This whole app and everything that happened after is just so sketchy. I immediately deleted it and Iâ€™m just praying nothing happens. Just whatever you do do NOT download this app! Iâ€™m so sad to say that but itâ€™s just horrible.
